test.name: Caso de Teste 1 - Validar alteração de senha inicial com sucesso

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Create a connection to an IBM3270 mainframe with the default port 23. To establish a connection, only the hostname is required. Optional parameters include logical unit name (LU) and port.

kw.name: Wait Until String
kw.arg: txt=Welcome to PUB400.COM * your public IBM i server
kw.doc: Wait until a string exists on the mainframe screen to perform the next step. If the string does not appear in 5 seconds, the keyword will raise an exception. You can define a different timeout.

kw.name: Quando realizo o login na aplicação
Write Bare In Position
kw.doc: Send only the string to the screen at screen coordinates ``ypos`` / ``xpos``.

kw.name: Move Next Field
kw.doc: Move the cursor to the next input field. Equivalent to pressing the Tab key.

kw.name: Write Bare
kw.doc: Send only the string to the screen at the current cursor location.

kw.name: Send Enter
kw.doc: Send an Enter to the screen.

kw.name: Então deve acessar o menu principal
Wait Until String
kw.doc: Wait until a string exists on the mainframe screen to perform the next step. If the string does not appear in 5 seconds, the keyword will raise an exception. You can define a different timeout.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Generate a screenshot of the IBM 3270 Mainframe in a html format. The default folder is the log folder of RobotFramework, if you want change see the `Set Screenshot Folder`.
